data.name: Full Pawer
data.detailed_description:
Lead, Create, Explore: Full Pawer is a top-down sandbox RTS where you play the role as a powerful spirit with the ability to shape the world. Use your powers to lead followers to glorious battles and valuable minerals. Create lush forests, savannas, grasslands filled with many unique creatures. Explore the lost lands of Plystia and discover the hidden treasures and evil that they hold.

- Explore dozens of lost islands
- Build up a mighty village
- Create lush and thriving biomes
- Unlock tons of bizarre creatures, plants, and spirits
- Discover the dark history of Plystia
- Meet quirky friends along the journey
data.about_the_game:
Lead, Create, Explore: Full Pawer is a top-down sandbox RTS where you play the role as a powerful spirit with the ability to shape the world. Use your powers to lead followers to glorious battles and valuable minerals. Create lush forests, savannas, grasslands filled with many unique creatures. Explore the lost lands of Plystia and discover the hidden treasures and evil that they hold.

- Build up a mighty village

data.short_description: Unlock the power within you in this epic Sandbox RTS adventure! Create lush environments, build impressive villages, and attempt to discover the dark past of Plystia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.0.1.19042
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU 6405U @ 2.40GHz, 2400 Mhz, 2 Core(s), 4 Logical Processor(s)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DxDiag 10.00.19041.0546 64-bit Unicode
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel(R) Display Audio
